context: Redfin went public in July 2017 as a technology-powered real estate brokerage. The company offered 1-1.5% listing fees compared to traditional 2.5-3%, combining agents with technology.

competitors.name: Zillow
competitors.notes: Real estate portal with agent referral business

competitors.name: Trulia (Zillow)
competitors.notes: Real estate portal owned by Zillow

competitors.name: Opendoor
competitors.notes: Emerging iBuyer model for instant offers
